parameters.query:
SELECT 
  p.id,
  p.name,
  p.brand,
  p.style_code,
  i.size,
  i.condition,
  i.purchase_cost,
  COALESCE(i.listed_price, 0) as current_price,
  i.id as inventory_id
FROM inventory.inventory_items i
JOIN products.products p ON i.product_id = p.id
WHERE i.status = 'listed'
  AND i.listed_price > 0
ORDER BY RANDOM()
LIMIT 50
